name: Magic Wizard Dress Up Game for Harry Potter
name_original: Magic Wizard Dress Up Game for Harry Potter
description:
===== BEST WIZARD DRESS UP GAME =====

If You love Harry Potter, they're back!! Everyone loves dress up games.. But they get boring. This is not your usual dress up game. The combinations allow for seemingly endless fun!

Features:
- 8 Wizard Characters
- 14 Magic Spells
- 15 Dresses
- 20 Hairstyles
- 15 Brooms
- 19 Pants
- 6 Backgrounds settings
- Over 4,500,000 combinations!
- Hours of entertainment

Start Creating Your Wizard Today, Download Now!
